title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5021.1 - General provisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5021.1 - General provisions

State Regulations

The member of the Retirement Board who is a retired teacher
shall be elected in accordance with the procedures hereinafter set forth. The
regular election for the position of retired teacher member of the Retirement

Board shall be held in October 1998 and in October of every third year
thereafter. The retired teacher member of the Retirement Board elected in the
regular election shall serve a term of three years commencing January 1st of
the year next following the year in which the election is
held. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5021.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
